head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRANDON, TECLA MARIE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRANDON, TECLA MARIE

block.p: BRANDON-Tecla Marie. Of Bronxville, NY on May 30, 2000. Beloved wife of the late John J. Brandon. Devoted mother of Allan Brandon, Barbara Brandon and Maureen Goldsborough. Survived by two sisters, C. Rita Wait and Barbara Roesing. Grandmother of 7 and great-grandmother of six. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath and son Funeral Home, Bronxville between the hours of 2:00-4:00 and 7:00-9:00 PM Thursday. Mass of Christian burial St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, on Friday, June 2 at 9:45 AM.
